name: Ball Roll
description:
ROLL BALL

Roll Ball is a small 3D Platformer game i've been developing recently in my spare time, the aim of the game is to reach the end of the level, the cartoon style graphics are visually pleasing and the game plays very well with no choppy frame lag.

CONTROLS

W / Move forward

A / Move Left

S / Move backwards

D / Move Right

Space / Jump

Escape / Pause

NOTE

This is the first game I've ever made, there's most likely gonna be lots of bugs, this is also a demo.
